00173 /* Data Context
00174  *
00175  * - listbases consist of CollectionPointerLink items and must be
00176  *   freed with BLI_freelistN!
00177  * - the dir listbase consits of LinkData items */
00178 
00179 /* data type, needed so we can tell between a NULL pointer and an empty list */
00180 enum {
00181     CTX_DATA_TYPE_POINTER = 0,
00182     CTX_DATA_TYPE_COLLECTION
00183 };

00210 #define CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, Type, instance, member)                             \
00211     {                                                                         \
00212         ListBase ctx_data_list;                                               \
00213         CollectionPointerLink *ctx_link;                                      \
00214         CTX_data_##member(C, &ctx_data_list);                                 \
00215         for (ctx_link = ctx_data_list.first;                                  \
00216              ctx_link;                                                        \
00217              ctx_link = ctx_link->next)                                       \
00218         {                                                                     \
00219             Type instance = ctx_link->ptr.data;
00220 
00221 #define CTX_DATA_END                                                          \
00222         }                                                                     \
00223         BLI_freelistN(&ctx_data_list);                                        \
00224     }
00225

00228 #define CTX_DATA_COUNT(C, member) \
00229     ctx_data_list_count(C, CTX_data_##member)
